Reviews.Title: “Only if you hate yourself!”
Reviews.Author: EmmaGordon6969
Reviews.Content: wish checked trip advisor booking horrific stay emailed complaint hotel company own didnt response surprised proves company rude incompetent throughout force arrival space carpark staff night porter rushed rudely doing assured guests check check parked bizarre 2 finish parking coming night porter suspiciously watched glass door approached door struggling luggage hands walked leaving bags door rude phone ringing night porter reception immediately hand car keys talking night manager unable supply proof insurance incase damage car possession keys illegal 4 told couldnt car keys told phone 1am 2am move car fine told move car onto road safe assured yes told didnt parking ticket til 9am checking street signs actually 8am listened staff parking fine uninformed 730am found car managed car park immediately told moved match day hotel rents car park stuff guests staff utterly uninterested vandalism unhelpful 6 spent morning talking garages arranging replace windscreen receptionist stay carpark wait repair book midday car gone midday told zero vision shattered windscreen stay 530pm book night pay £15 space unsympathetic 1 night stay resulted distressing 24 hrs response staff led wholly unacceptable customer service experience top hot smelly unclean loud noises coming corridors outside worst hotel experience life awful

Reviews.Content: pay fine hotel close underground run directly westminster ben london eye etc hotel prime location stamford bridge 50m 200m underground 100 meters expensive streets london kings road celebrities windows ferrari porsche car bmw audi land rover hotel restaurants cafes shops etc staff sweet offered book taxi airport mastered breakfast fantastic dinner fine hotel 5 star sleep walk shower perfectly fine

Reviews.Title: “Small, tired rooms but great location!”
Reviews.Author: ShezzaLancashire Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel situated door chelsea football club arrived 2pm match day extremely busy imagine security staff front door hotel didnt presumably match day precaution checkin easy remember thinking lounge looked shoddy stained settee reception arrival gone time probably awaiting removal situated ground floor reception furnishings shoddy upgrading disappointing compared website pictures beds comfortable breakfast nice menu satisfy people continental english available vegetarian option vegetarian burger sausage earls court hotel close fulham broadway tube station convenient travel stay weekend staff pleasant hotel adequate stay ensure looked choices vicinity

Reviews.Content: rampant please dont stay refuse rectify beds bugs 100 bites risk bringing home manager aware issue refuses rid mattresses please pass

Reviews.Title: “Worse every time”
Reviews.Author: osmachar
Reviews.Content: past 10 stayed hotel 3 times time hotel pleasant 3 star friendly staff satellite tv ok decor time staff friendly sat tv reduced breakfast quality redeeming feature free parking ok stayed month mainly parking space bad arrived day power cut staff inconvenience unfriendly barely understand english wasnt hoovered due soon power told tomorrow wasnt actually bad cleaned ws smallish worn furniture linen clean matrass looked ok eye curtains bed spread washed time ago tv hardly watchable due bad reception bathroom tiles cracked appeared cleaned morning breakfast ok rolls croissants fresh morning rolls croissants tasted previous week checking complained charging price bad breakfast receptionist rude sound fault minded negatives price pais £85 night service standart absolutely match price

Reviews.Content: stayed july wife bitten bed bugs clean found couple linen blood friggin wouldnt die popped disgusting checking bed hotel afterwards managerowner tried imply brought leg trip stepped business dont wring didnt actually breakfast crap standard cereal bread bit stale

Reviews.Content: returning hotel paid twin value £40 car park bays park leave keys 4 vehicles reception moved beds uncomfortable springs sticking sleeping pillows lumpy linen didnt look freshest showers set height bang head decor attention worst complaint staff found ate drank elsewhere resulted losing £300 thats spent venue breakfast continental style toast walk restaurant look sugar

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother! I'd rather stay in a hostel!”
Reviews.Author: love2travel119
Reviews.Content: hostel quality hotel prices stay youre heavy sleeper fussed comfort youre football ok size bed linen clean wasnt comfortable youre late preferably drunk fussed comfort bed hours sleep am heavy sleeper ill happily sleep traffic noises talking car alarms etc violently awoken slamming doors pretty hour free parking marked bays literally park whatever fits cars blocked didnt feel safe car parked single yellow line fulham road instead single yellows 6pm8am day sundays tv didnt hairdryer 2 minutes switch air conditioning summer heat humidity fan luckily bathroom clean tiles chipped cracked hand soap bottles body wash shampoo refilled times pumps broken unscrew lid pour body wash stay bring own wash toothpaste toothbrush importantly ear plugs customer service wasnt wait 10 minutes empty reception desk staff speak staff occasions found reception desk im trying hotel finish following complimentary basket fruit teamaking facilities bed bath linen clean isnt 5 minute walk fulham broadway tube station restaurants bars nearby accessible tofrom central london museums shopping etc sainsburys boots shops located tube station shopping centre 10 min walk lovely thai restaurant called blue elephant seat situated chelsea football stadium youre football

Reviews.Title: “surprise surprise”

Reviews.Content: friend booked hotel 4 reading reviews looking forward itbut pleasantly agree hotel dated decorating clean continental breakfast excellent staff spoke pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: Jamcc21
Reviews.Content: book hotel looks okay website story inside booked 5 night stay arrival absolute disgrace door didnt close properly bathroom filthy double bed twins pushed stay complained wait day moved slightly cleaner bigger improvement food staff unhelpful
